name: StreamGist
description: A personalized recommendation system that helps streamers discover games that maximize their visibility without forcing a vibe they don't want. Provides real-time, data-driven game recommendations based on information collected from streaming platforms like Twitch, YouTube, and Kick.
role: Architected the application from scratch, developing both front-end and back-end modules, including user management, recommendation calculations and management, payments, notifications, and caching
Built data processing pipelines to fetch continuous real-time data from multiple sources, aggregate statistics, and connect insights to user preferences for personalized recommendations
Designed a fully responsive, mobile-friendly front-end with pagination and interactive features for improved user experience
Developed services for notifications (emails, etc.), ensuring high reliability and reduced failure rates
Implemented Stripe-based payment management, including user payment-based boosts with monitoring and control
Optimized recommendation and reasoning pipelines using caching and OpenAI for cost-efficient operations
Captured implicit and explicit user feedback to continuously improve recommendation accuracy
Built reporting systems for internal analytics, supporting complex queries to generate daily and weekly statistics for reports based on third-party data and user activity
Managed deployment pipelines with Docker and Digital Ocean, including bulk reporting automation
